RC.DescriptionEn: This detail is the mandatory description of the additional information code you have used. This detail cannot be provided if you have not used an additional information code.
The presented item is in the wrong state.
If Type of location is D , function="UNLOCODE" can be used ELSE function="UNLOCODE" cannot be used
If Type of location is A , function="CustomsOffice" can be used ELSE function="CustomsOffice" cannot be used
If Type of location is A or D , function="GPS" can be used ELSE function="GPS" cannot be used
If Type of location is B or C , function="EO" can be used ELSE function="EO" cannot be used
If Type of location = C , function="Authorisation" can be used ELSE function="Authorisation" cannot be used
If Type of location is A, C or D, location "Address" can be used ELSE If Type of location = B , Location "Address" cannot be used
If additional information code FISSL or FITSH, THEN cannot be used. ELSE IF additional information code FIEVR, FIHPL or FIOSP THEN = 'O'; ELSE 'R'
Either Consignment or HouseConsignment, but not both
If additional information = 10600, THEN cannot be used
If goods are containerised, entered on either Consignment,HouseConsignment or ConsignmentItem level, but not on multiple
If additional information = 10600, THEN must be used
Identification number can not be same for all HouseConsignments.
If House level previous document is given, THEN item = 'N'. ELSE = 'R'
Either goods description or commodity code must be given
Used if trader wants to reuse ENS data to form a TSD. IF additional information code FIRUE is entered, then this group = 'R'. ELSE = 'N'
"If additional information code (FISSL), THEN cannot be used. ELSE IF additional information code FIHPL or FIOSP THEN = 'O', ELSE ´R`
Type of location must be 'B'
If Additional Information FITTJ is given no validation for previous document is done.
Street address of goods locations must be in Finland (country code FI).
The number of packages at goods item can be zero (0) only when more than one goods item have been packed within one and the same package.
It is not allowed to declare the same authorisation type more than once
The trader identification number must begin with a 2-character country code, for example FI.
The trader identification number has an incorrect format. The format can be for example a Finnish EORI number consisting of the country code and a Business ID.
The representative's identification number cannot be amended.
The service provider cannot declare themselves in any trader role (declarant, representative or importer) in the declaration.
The declared commodity code is not valid on the acceptance date of the declaration.
If starts with FI + some 3. country code like RU or NO (3. country EORI registration made in Finland), must be found from trader register even without trader office code.
According to the customer register of Customs, the submitter of the declaration does not have the right to act as a service provider for the e-services of Customs.
Only direct representative is possible
Submitter can be declarant, representative or trader whose warehouse identification is given on TSD/ENS
Warehouse type must be 'V' or 'H'
Warehouse type must be 'V'
Authorisation type must be 'TST'
Warehouse must be according given authorisation
Declarant id EORI must be = Warehouse id EORI

Each ‘Goods Item Number’ is unique throughout the declaration. The items shall be numbered in a sequential fashion, starting from '1' for the first item and incrementing the numbering by '1' for each following item".
The trader detail cannot be amended.
EORI number shall be declared.
‘Goods Item Number’ is always used even if ‘Items’ = ‘1’, ‘Goods Item Number’ is also ‘1’.
The number of packages must be declared, except for bulk goods, such as VQ, VG, VL, VY, VR, VS and VO.

Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential, starting from '1' for the first iteration of the Data Group and increasing by '1' for each iteration.
Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential.
If additional information code FIEVR is given then previous document type must be "ZZZ".
Warehouse id must be entered
If additional code FITSH or FIEVR is given THEN cannot be used; ELSE R.
The MRN must be unique for each consignment.
If additional information code (FIVAA or FITAA or FIETD), THEN = 'R'. ELSE can not be used.
At least one of these must be entered: Text or Provided Information
If invalidation reason code is H or D, THEN = 'R'. If reason code is V THEN = 'O'. ELSE can not be used.
IF movement complete = 0, THEN 'R', otherwise 'O'.
If previous document type is IM, THEN cannot be used; ELSE 'O'.

Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential, starting from '1' for the first iteration of the Data Group and increasing by '1' for each iteration.
Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to.

IF /*/Consignment/LocationOfGoods/EconomicOperator/identificationNumber is PRESENT OR /*/Consignment/LocationOfGoods/authorisationNumber is PRESENT THEN /*/Consignment/LocationOfGoods/additionalIdentifier = "O" ELSE /*/Consignment/LocationOfGoods/additionalIdentifier = "N"
If previous document type is IM, 1ZZZ or N825, THEN cannot be used; ELSE R.
goods item number must be unique
CUS code must be 9 digits
Presentation notification with PoUS reference or pre-lodged import declaration can not be amended.
Alatason kuljetusasiakirjan edeltävän asiakirjan MRN on oltava sama kaikilla erillä
Amendment of TSD with re-used ENS data is not possible
